TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompatibleFrameworks extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides details about versions of the .NET Framework on which this application can install and run.
Gets a list of .NET Framework versions on which this application can install and run.
Docs.value: A list of objects that specify the .NET Framework versions on which this application can install and run.

Docs.summary: Gets a <xref:System.Uri> that provides the user with instructions for installing a version of the .NET Framework on which this application can install and run.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Uri> that provides the user with instructions for installing a version of the .NET Framework on which this application can install and run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SupportUrl property contains the <xref:System.Uri> that can appear in the `SupportUrl` attribute within the [\<compatibleFrameworks\> Element](../Topic/%3CcompatibleFrameworks%3E%20Element%20\(ClickOnce%20Deployment\).md).
